name: decoupler
description: Python package to infer biological activities from omics data using a collection of methods.
test_command:
pip install wheel && \
pip install pytest-cov flake8 sklearn skranger omnipath scanpy adjustText . && \
pytest --cov --disable-warnings decoupler

name: infercnvpy
description: Infer copy number variation (CNV) from scRNA-seq data. Plays nicely with Scanpy.
